dmtimer1ms.h File Reference

Timer API prototypes and macros. More...

#include <ti/csl/cslr_timer.h>
#include <ti/csl/hw_types.h>
#include <stdint.h>

Data Structures

struct  dmtimer1msContext
 Structure to store the timer context. More...
 

Macros

Values that can be passed to DMTIMER1MSPreScalerClkEnable as ptv so as to derive

Pre-Scalar clock from timer clock.

#define DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_2
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_4
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_8
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_16
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_32
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_64
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_128
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_256
 
Values that can be passed to DMTIMER1MSModeConfigure as timerMode.
#define DMTIMER1MS_ONESHOT_CMP_ENABLE   (DMTIMER_1MS_TCLR_CE_MASK)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_ONESHOT_NOCMP_ENABLE   (0x0000000)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_AUTORLD_CMP_ENABLE
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_AUTORLD_NOCMP_ENABLE   (DMTIMER_1MS_TCLR_AR_MASK)
 
Values that can be passed to DMTIMER1MSGPOConfigure as gpoCfg.
#define DMTIMER1MS_GPO_CFG_0   (DMTIMER_1MS_TCLR_GPO_CFG_0)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_GPO_CFG_1
 
Values that can be passed to DMTIMER1MSIntStatusClear

as intFlags. Also these values can be used while checking the status got from TIMERIntRawStatusGet/TIMERIntStatusGet. Any combination is also followed. Example- (DMTIMER1MS_INT_TCAR_IT_FLAG | DMTIMER1MS_INT_OVF_IT_FLAG)

#define DMTIMER1MS_INT_TCAR_IT_FLAG
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_INT_OVF_IT_FLAG
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_INT_MAT_IT_FLAG
 
Values that can be passed to DMTIMER1MSIntEnable/DMTIMER1MSIntDisable as intFlags.

Also these values can be used while checking the status got from TIMERIntEnableGet. Any combination is also followed. Example- (DMTIMER1MS_INT_TCAR_EN_FLAG | DMTIMER1MS_INT_OVF_EN_FLAG)

#define DMTIMER1MS_INT_TCAR_EN_FLAG
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_INT_OVF_EN_FLAG
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_INT_MAT_EN_FLAG
 
Values that can be passed to DMTIMER1MSWakeEnable/DMTIMER1MSWakeDisable as wakeFlags.

Any combination is also followed. Example- (DMTIMER1MS_WAKE_TCAR_FLAG | DMTIMER1MS_WAKE_OVF_FLAG)

#define DMTIMER1MS_WAKE_TCAR_FLAG
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_WAKE_OVF_FLAG
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_WAKE_MAT_FLAG
 
Values that can be passed to DMTIMER1MSResetConfigure as rstOption.
#define DMTIMER1MS_SFT_RESET_ENABLE   (DMTIMER_1MS_TSICR_SFT_MASK)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_SFT_RESET_DISABLE   (DMTIMER_1MS_TSICR_SFT_0)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_POSTED   (DMTIMER_1MS_TSICR_POSTED_MASK)
 Values that can be passed to TIMERPostedModeConfig as postMode.
 
Values that can be used while checking status received from

DMTIMER1MSWritePostedStatusGet API.

#define DMTIMER1MS_WRITE_POST_TMAR   ((uint32_t) DMTIMER_1MS_TWPS_W_PEND_TMAR_MASK)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_WRITE_POST_TTGR   ((uint32_t) DMTIMER_1MS_TWPS_W_PEND_TTGR_MASK)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_WRITE_POST_TLDR   ((uint32_t) DMTIMER_1MS_TWPS_W_PEND_TLDR_MASK)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_WRITE_POST_TCRR   ((uint32_t) DMTIMER_1MS_TWPS_W_PEND_TCRR_MASK)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_WRITE_POST_TCLR   ((uint32_t) DMTIMER_1MS_TWPS_W_PEND_TCLR_MASK)
 
Values that can be passed to DMTIMER1MSIdleModeConfigure as idleModeOption.
#define DMTIMER1MS_FORCE_IDLE   (DMTIMER_1MS_TIOCP_CFG_IDLEMODE_FIDLE)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_NO_IDLE   (DMTIMER_1MS_TIOCP_CFG_IDLEMODE_NIDLE)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_SMART_IDLE   (DMTIMER_1MS_TIOCP_CFG_IDLEMODE_SIDLE)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_SMART_IDLE_WAKEUP   (DMTIMER_1MS_TIOCP_CFG_IDLEMODE_RES)
 
Values that can be passed to DMTIMER1MSEmuModeConfigure as emuModeOption.
#define DMTIMER1MS_FROZEN   (DMTIMER_1MS_TIOCP_CFG_EMUFREE_TIMER_FROZEN)
 
#define DMTIMER1MS_FREE   (DMTIMER_1MS_TIOCP_CFG_EMUFREE_TIMER_FREE)

Detailed Description

Timer API prototypes and macros.

This file contains the driver API prototypes and macro definitions.

Function Documentation

uint32_t DMTIMER1MSCompareGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Get the match register contents.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the match register contents.
void DMTIMER1MSCompareSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  compareVal 
)

Set the match register with the compare value.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
compareValCompare value.
Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSContextRestore ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const DMTIMER1MSCONTEXT *  contextPtr 
)

This API restores the context of the TIMER.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
contextPtrPointer to the structure where the DM timer context need to be restored from.
Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSContextSave ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
DMTIMER1MSCONTEXT *  contextPtr 
)

This API stores the context of the TIMER.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
contextPtrPointer to the structure where the DM timer context need to be saved.
Returns
None.
uint32_t DMTIMER1MSCounterGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Get/Read the counter value from the counter register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the count value present in the Timer Counter register.
Note
: Value can be read from the counter register when the counter is stopped or when it is running.
void DMTIMER1MSCounterSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  counter 
)

Set/Write the Counter register with the counter value.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
counterCount value for the timer.
Returns
None.
Note
Value can be loaded into the counter register when the counter is stopped or when it is running.
void DMTIMER1MSDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will stop the timer.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSEmuModeConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  emuModeOption 
)

Configure the timer status in emulation mode.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
emuModeOptionEmulation mode configuration.

'emuModeOption' can take the following values
DMTIMER1MS_FROZEN - Timer is frozen in emuMode
DMTIMER1MS_FREE - Timer is free in emuMode

Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will start the timer.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
Note
The timer must be configured before it is started/enabled.
void DMTIMER1MSGPOConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  gpoCfg 
)

Configure general purpose output pin.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
gpoCfgGeneral purpose output.

'gpoCfg' can take the following values
DMTIMER1MS_GPO_CFG_0 - PORGPOCFG drives 0
DMTIMER1MS_GPO_CFG_1 - PORGPOCFG drives 1

Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSIdleModeConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  idleModeOption 
)

Configure the timer idle mode.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
idleModeOptionIdle mode configuration.

'idleModeOption' can take the following values DMTIMER1MS_FORCE_IDLE - Timer is in Force-idle Mode DMTIMER1MS_NO_IDLE - Timer is in No-idle Mode DMTIMER1MS_SMART_IDLE - Timer is in Smart-idle mode DMTIMER1MS_SMART_IDLE_WAKEUP - Timer is in Smart-idle wake-up-capable mode

Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSIntDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intFlags 
)

Disable the Timer interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
intFlagsVariable used to disable the interrupts.

'intFlags' can take the following values
DMTIMER1MS_INT_TCAR_EN_FLAG - IRQ disable for capture
DMTIMER1MS_INT_OVF_EN_FLAG - IRQ disable for overflow
DMTIMER1MS_INT_MAT_EN_FLAG - IRQ disable for match

Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSIntEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intFlags 
)

Enable the Timer interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
intFlagsVariable used to enable the interrupts.

'intFlags' can take the following values
DMTIMER1MS_INT_TCAR_EN_FLAG - IRQ enable for capture
DMTIMER1MS_INT_OVF_EN_FLAG - IRQ enable for overflow
DMTIMER1MS_INT_MAT_EN_FLAG - IRQ enable for match

Returns
None.
uint32_t DMTIMER1MSIntEnableGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Read the status of IRQENABLE_SET register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the status of IRQENABLE_SET register.
void DMTIMER1MSIntStatusClear ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intFlags 
)

Clear the status of interrupt events.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
intFlagsVariable used to clear the events.

'intFlags' can take the following values
DMTIMER1MS_INT_TCAR_IT_FLAG - Clear IRQ status for capture
DMTIMER1MS_INT_OVF_IT_FLAG - Clear IRQ status for overflow
DMTIMER1MS_INT_MAT_IT_FLAG - Clear IRQ status for match

Returns
None.
uint32_t DMTIMER1MSIntStatusGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Read the status of IRQ_STATUS register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the status of IRQSTATUS register.
void DMTIMER1MSModeConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  timerMode 
)

This API will configure the timer in combinations of 'One Shot timer' and 'Compare' Mode or 'Auto-reload timer' and 'Compare' Mode.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
timerModeMode for enabling the timer.

'timerMode' can take the following values
DMTIMER1MS_ONESHOT_CMP_ENABLE - One shot and compare mode enabled
DMTIMER1MS_ONESHOT_NOCMP_ENABLE - One shot enabled, compare mode disabled
DMTIMER1MS_AUTORLD_CMP_ENABLE - Auto-reload and compare mode enabled
DMTIMER1MS_AUTORLD_NOCMP_ENABLE - Auto-reload enabled, compare mode disabled

Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSPostedModeConfig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  postMode 
)

Configure the posted mode of TIMER.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
postModePosted mode configuration.

'postMode' can take the following values
DMTIMER1MS_NONPOSTED - Posted mode not used
DMTIMER1MS_POSTED - Posted mode used

Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSPreScalerClkDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will disable the pre-scaler clock.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSPreScalerClkEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  ptv 
)

This API will configure and enable the pre-scaler clock.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
ptvPre-scale clock Timer value.

'ptv' can take the following values
DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_2 - Timer clock divide by 2
DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_4 - Timer clock divide by 4
DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_8 - Timer clock divide by 8
DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_16 - Timer clock divide by 16
DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_32 - Timer clock divide by 32
DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_64 - Timer clock divide by 64
DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_128 - Timer clock divide by 128
DMTIMER1MS_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_256 - Timer clock divide by 256

Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSReadModeConfig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  readMode 
)

Configure the read mode of TIMER.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
readModeread mode configuration.

'readMode' can take the following values
DMTIMER1MS_READ_MODE_POSTED - Read mode Posted and Module configured in Non Posted mode
DMTIMER1MS_READ_MODE_NONPOSTED - Read mode non Posted and Module configured in Non Posted mode

Returns
None.
uint32_t DMTIMER1MSReloadGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Get the reload count value from the timer load register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the value present in Timer Load Register.
void DMTIMER1MSReloadSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  reload 
)

Set the reload count value in the timer load register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
reloadThe reload count value of the timer.
Returns
None.
Note
: It is recommended to not use reload value as 0xFFFFFFFF as it can lead to undesired results.
void DMTIMER1MSReset ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Reset the Timer module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSResetConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  rstOption 
)

Enable/Disable software reset for Timer module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
rstOptionEnable/Disable reset option for TIMER.

'rstOption' can take the following values
DMTIMER1MS_SFT_RESET_ENABLE - Software reset is enabled
DMTIMER1MS_SFT_RESET_DISABLE - Software reset is disabled

Returns
None.

uint32_t  val 
)

Configure the TCVR counter value.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of 1ms the Timer Module Register.
valThe TCVR value.
Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSTNIRSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  tnirVal 
)

Configure the negative increment value which is added TCVR to determine whether next value is subperiod or overperiod value.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the 1ms Timer Module Register.
tnirValThe negative increment value
Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSTOCRSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  val 
)

Configure the number of ticks for which the tick interrupt has to be masked.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the 1ms Timer Module Register.
valValue representing the number of ticks to be masked
Returns
None.
uint32_t DMTIMER1MSTOWRGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Read the number of masked overflow interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the 1ms Timer Module Register.
Returns
Over flow wrapping value.
void DMTIMER1MSTOWRSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  val 
)

Configure the overflow count mask value in TOWR register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the 1ms Timer Module Register.
valValue representing the number of ticks to be masked
Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSTPIRSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  tpirVal 
)

Configure the positive increment value which is added TCVR to determine whether next value is subperiod or overperiod value.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the 1ms Timer Module Register.
tpirValThe Positive increment value.
Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSTriggerSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Set/enable the trigger write access.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
Note
When we have enabled the timer in Auto-reload mode, the value from TLDR is reloaded into TCRR when a overflow condition occurs. But if we want to load the contents from TLDR to TCRR before overflow occurs then call this API.
void DMTIMER1MSWakeDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  wakeFlags 
)

Disable the Timer Wakeup.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
wakeFlagsVariable used to disable the Wakeup events.

'intFlags' can take the following values DMTIMER_1MS_TWER_TCAR_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup disable for capture DMTIMER_1MS_TWER_OVF_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup disable for overflow DMTIMER_1MS_TWER_MAT_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup disable for match

Returns
None.
void DMTIMER1MSWakeEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  wakeFlags 
)

Enable the Timer Wakeup.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
wakeFlagsVariable used to enable the Wakeup events.

'intFlags' can take the following values DMTIMER_1MS_TWER_TCAR_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup enable for capture DMTIMER_1MS_TWER_OVF_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup enable for overflow DMTIMER_1MS_TWER_MAT_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup enable for match

Returns
None.
uint32_t DMTIMER1MSWritePostedStatusGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Read the status of Write Posted Status register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the status of TWPS register.
